review: Tums Regular Strength (calcium carbonate):It’s made my stomach worse and I’ve thrown up due to it.

Alka-Mints (calcium carbonate):These  Alka-Mints work as well or better than Tums and are easier to breakup by chewing, also I love the spearmint flavor.  No one else seems to make spearmint antacids.

Alka-Seltzer Fruit Chews (Antacid) (calcium carbonate):I've been taking these every day for months now, (mostly because I don't eat much) and it helps a lot! The only downside to it is I have small bowel issues (to my knowledge at least) and these don't help, but the effects are minor.
Alka-Seltzer Fruit Chews (Antacid) (calcium carbonate):Works great, totally taste great. Able to side track need for sweetie-treat after dinner meal. {no more than 2}.  Thanks Alke-S.
Tums Smoothies (calcium carbonate):It gave me cancer
Tums Ultra 1000 (calcium carbonate):Works great for me!
Alka-Seltzer Fruit Chews (Antacid) (calcium carbonate):Very convenient & easy to use. Always take it with me. Effective on acid reflux episodes.  Taste like candy...watch out for overdosing.

Tums Regular Strength (calcium carbonate):It works well, and very quickly! One or two tabs taken after a cup of coffee helps to avoid acid indigestion. Works for me; cheap, easy to use, safe. Nothing faster!
Titralac (calcium carbonate):I do not like to chew sweet pills; so these are perfect to swallow.  Works very fast to relieve indigestion.
Tums Regular Strength (calcium carbonate):It works fine on simple heartburns but not on complicated ones.
Titralac (calcium carbonate):Best fast acting tasty stuff ever
